Title: There Is Not Currently a Problem
Writer: Stephen Falk (created by), Stephen Falk, Philippe Iujvidin, Eva Anderson (executive story editor), Alison Bennett (executive story editor)
Actors: Chris Geere, Aya Cash, Desmin Borges, Kether Donohue
Plot: The group tries to get rid of a mouse in Jimmy's house; Gretchen finally opens up to Jimmy.
